item.title: Building a simple Admin Page
item.description: Description Piklist makes it super easy to create admin pages in WordPress. New to Piklist? Before you start this tutorial: Install Piklist like you would any other WordPress plugin. Decide if you are going to add the code in this tutorial to your custom plugin or your theme. This will define how to setup your Piklist folder structure. If you're new to Piklist, you may want to review the "
